name: Paper.io 2 Multiplayer
description: In Paper.io, you must conquer as much territory as you can by drawing a line that marks your territory. However, be careful not to stray too far because if another player breaks your line before you can connect it to your territory, you will be met with a game over. Increase your territory until you reach the top of the scoreboard, or until you have conquered 100% of the available territory and defeat other players
